<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> Dynamics Research</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <A NAME=HEADING123></A> <A HREF="AR95Book-124.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-122.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-66.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-124.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-122.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-66.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> <A NAME=HEADING123-0></A> <H1> Dynamics Research</H1> Principal Investigator: <A HREF=AR95Book-39.html>Elisha Sacks</A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> Dr. Sacks has developed an analysis program for one-parameter planar dynamical systems that performs comparably to experts. The program constructs phase diagrams, which represent the steady-state behavior over a range of initial conditions, and bifurcation diagrams, with represent the changes in steady-state behavior over a range of parameter values. It displays the diagrams symbolically and graphically. The program has solved an open problem in cardiology and corrected mistaken analyses in major journals.<P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <ADDRESS>CS Annual Report - 19 APR 1996</ADDRESS> <A HREF="AR95Book-124.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bnext.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-122.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bprev.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-66.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bup.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Btop.gif"></A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html"><IMG ALIGN = BOTTOM SRC = "Bcontent.gif"></A><BR><A HREF="AR95Book-124.html">[Next] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-122.html">[Previous] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-66.html">[Up] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-1.html">[Top] </A><A HREF="AR95Book-2.html">[Contents]</A> <P> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
